# Bestial Swimmer (Ex)
## Overview
*Bestial Swimmer (Ex)*: While raging, the barbarian gains a natural swim speed equal to her normal land speed. A barbarian must have the [[Raging Swimmer (Ex)|raging swimmer]] rage power and be at least 6th level before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 26
